name: #IWantToCreate Poissons conspirateurs
description:
Video of the game : https://youtu.be/4C4D3WPfduM

There is a conspiracy in the ocean. Amphitrite wants Poseidon's crown and she send fishes you control to steal the crown!

This is a little game made for https://itch.io/jam/iwanttocreate#entries

Music composer is Benjamin Baldassini

Graphist is Julie Ramon

Developper is Louis Denizet

Controls are mouse to aim and left clic to speed the fishes
